name: Pink Lady Cosmo
description: Sip, savor, and indulge! Bursting with sweet, zesty flavors, this drink uses syrup made with herbal tea so itâ€™s perfect for those looking for a skinnier option for their happy hour.

ingredients.name: Really Simple Pink Lemonade Herbal Tea infused Syrup

preparation: Fill a cocktail shaker with ice, then add vodka, triple sec, syrup, and lime juice.
Shake well, strain, and pour into prepared glasses. Garnish with orange or lime peel/twist.
tips: Use infused vodka as well as syrup for that extra punch!

products.name: Pink Lemonade Herbal Tea Blend
summary: A versatile sipper reminiscent of old-time lemonade and packed with thirst-busting citrusy flavour!
